sts-51

I think a cool addition to the shuttle would be to have the option of having the old NASA livery for the orbiters. I think its basically like the Challenger livery but with the different orbiter names.

![GPN-2000-001091_640.jpg](http://airandspace.si.edu/webimages/640/GPN-2000-001091_640.jpg)

Here's a picture of Discovery with the old livery for a reference of what I'm talking about.

> 
> I think a cool addition to the shuttle would be to have the option of having the old NASA livery for the orbiters. I think its basically like the Challenger livery but with the different orbiter names.
